title: Adjust org table content
body:
[![Screenshot_2025-07-18_13-13-49.png](https://img.marker.io/s/687a488df19900d583e68382/2?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..epCoxo1pLGfW19wDeCX_7YzisK_AGyB-xcTFatcavDs)](https://img.marker.io/s/687a488df19900d583e68382/0?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..epCoxo1pLGfW19wDeCX_7YzisK_AGyB-xcTFatcavDs) 1. I think important to include owner (with link to the user). 2. Good to have status. 3. Might be useful to indicate number of projects. 4. I think we need a filter at top for personal vs standard, or just totally separate these with subnav. Since every user will get a personal org, i'm more interested in Standard over time. 5. I think the click through should be on the description column, which feels like the name column. I really hate the name and description construct we have. Very not intuitive!! --- **Reported by:** Jacob Smith (jsmith@datum.net) **Source URL:** [https://staff.datum.net/organizations](https://staff.datum.net/organizations) **Marker.io Issue type:** Improvement **Issue details:** [Open in Marker.io](https://app.marker.io/i/687a488df19900d583e68386?advanced=1) â€” #MILO-2
Device typedesktop

title: Time zone
body:
[![Screenshot_2025-07-30_02-43-07.png](https://img.marker.io/s/688986bbc4948b80a853a262/2?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..f4nYoEtk16RuGmL0G4FSdR59n7xpmTjlYHh3sXptBwM)](https://img.marker.io/s/688986bbc4948b80a853a262/0?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..f4nYoEtk16RuGmL0G4FSdR59n7xpmTjlYHh3sXptBwM) We should have a timezone for proper context. --- **Reported by:** Jacob Smith (jsmith@datum.net) **Source URL:** [https://staff.datum.net/users/328747448287632651](https://staff.datum.net/users/328747448287632651) **Marker.io Issue type:** Improvement **Issue details:** [Open in Marker.io](https://app.marker.io/i/688986bbc4948b80a853a266?advanced=1) â€” #MILO-6

title: Include filter and link from full name
body:
[![Screenshot_2025-07-30_02-46-54.png](https://img.marker.io/s/6889879ec4948b80a853a8cb/2?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ate_i4SCm-PYaP2DMoQXe63D2Wr9-5hWta8DcL5ahog)](https://img.marker.io/s/6889879ec4948b80a853a8cb/0?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ate_i4SCm-PYaP2DMoQXe63D2Wr9-5hWta8DcL5ahog) 1. We should have an easy filter to see personal vs standard orgs. 2. I think it is more intuitive to link from "Datum Technology, Inc" vs the other name. I'm not sure I would even show the name. 3. We should show the user that is the owner of each org and allow click through to user detail. 4. It might be nice to show number of active projects or something. Sorting by column? --- **Reported by:** Jacob Smith (jsmith@datum.net) **Source URL:** [https://staff.datum.net/organizations](https://staff.datum.net/organizations) **Marker.io Issue type:** Improvement **Issue details:** [Open in Marker.io](https://app.marker.io/i/6889879ec4948b80a853a8cf?advanced=1) â€” #MILO-8

title: Projects should be associated with orgs
body:
[![Screenshot_2025-07-30_02-48-18.png](https://img.marker.io/s/688987f2a870b1be1182318e/2?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ml8Zi1nlCTWbu32RydNBNNwgP6Xexo1IeoyAZ5ymfns)](https://img.marker.io/s/688987f2a870b1be1182318e/0?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ml8Zi1nlCTWbu32RydNBNNwgP6Xexo1IeoyAZ5ymfns) I think keep the subnav context so an admin user can easily toggle back from projects to org views. Maybe user horizontal tabs to drill deeper into the details of each project. --- **Reported by:** Jacob Smith (jsmith@datum.net) **Source URL:** [https://staff.datum.net/projects/datum-cloud](https://staff.datum.net/projects/datum-cloud) **Marker.io Issue type:** Improvement **Issue details:** [Open in Marker.io](https://app.marker.io/i/688987f2a870b1be11823192?advanced=1) â€” #MILO-9

title: Add context to creation
body:

title: Retool activity log to show the action or event
body:
[![Screenshot_2025-08-11_21-28-13.png](https://img.marker.io/s/689a606de5f8489c159aac0f/2?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..n_-yNeac7VMsLTFSkc6Ey1g7QVx_fviEzlM1CDjl8yw)](https://img.marker.io/s/689a606de5f8489c159aac0f/0?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..n_-yNeac7VMsLTFSkc6Ey1g7QVx_fviEzlM1CDjl8yw) I don't think "message" is the right thing to show here. We should show the action that was taken such as "added a new domain resource "datum-cloud-dot-ai" or whatever. Do we plan to have source IP? For timestamp, we'll need to have more detail than "5 days ago". I think we can use that format for anything under 30 minutes but otherwise we should show the actual time stamp like we do on the customer portal. --- **Reported by:** Jacob Smith (jsmith@datum.net) **Source URL:** [https://staff.datum.net/customers/projects/testing-the-speed-of-pr-99n3u2/activity](https://staff.datum.net/customers/projects/testing-the-speed-of-pr-99n3u2/activity) **Marker.io Issue type:** Improvement **Issue details:** [Open in Marker.io](https://app.marker.io/i/689a606de5f8489c159aac13?advanced=1) â€” #MILO-11

title: Additional pieces of user info possible?
body:
[![Screenshot_2025-10-01_10-43-46.png](https://img.marker.io/s/68dd05e259242ac4a86da17f/2?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..W3zjbF6mWDxHIIEDwugqSsgbcp1lTCQLN647QPM7FQ8)](https://img.marker.io/s/68dd05e259242ac4a86da17f/0?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..W3zjbF6mWDxHIIEDwugqSsgbcp1lTCQLN647QPM7FQ8) To help understand users, could we see: 1. Which social provider they used to signup / are currently using? 2. Last time they logged in 3. Any chance we can pull in their photo from Google or GitHub, depending on their IDP? --- **Reported by:** Jacob Smith (jsmith@datum.net) **Source URL:** [https://staff.datum.net/customers/users/328808218367106315](https://staff.datum.net/customers/users/328808218367106315) **Marker.io Issue type:** Improvement **Issue details:** [Open in Marker.io](https://app.marker.io/i/68dd05e259242ac4a86da183?advanced=1) â€” #MILO-13

body:

title: Show group name and ID
body:
[![Screenshot_2025-10-21_20-39-31.png](https://img.marker.io/s/68f7ef838991532c10f5d597/2?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1RKnrRiBTn-WxSnnvlQhH7LehCfjSUCjAkNrKXm8Rq4)](https://img.marker.io/s/68f7ef838991532c10f5d597/0?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1RKnrRiBTn-WxSnnvlQhH7LehCfjSUCjAkNrKXm8Rq4) we need to show more about a group. I would include the name and ID somewhere Can you delete it? Edit the name? Maybe we don't take up a full form in the middle here. A description field would be amazing, so we could describe the purpose of a group. --- ðŸ§· Attached files: **-** [Screenshot 2025-10-21 at 4.35.25â€¯PM.png (52.8KB)](https://files.marker.io/f/672d0d52ae8bec08ae4470ac/68f7ef838991532c10f5d59d) **-** [Screenshot 2025-10-21 at 4.37.39â€¯PM.png (23.2KB)](https://files.marker.io/f/672d0d52ae8bec08ae4470ac/68f7ef838991532c10f5d599) **-** [Screenshot 2025-10-21 at 4.39.03â€¯PM.png (22.9KB)](https://files.marker.io/f/672d0d52ae8bec08ae4470ac/68f7ef838991532c10f5d59b) --- **Reported by:** Jacob Smith (jsmith@datum.net) **Source URL:** [https://staff.datum.net/contact-groups/allusers-contact-group-4lqxdp](https://staff.datum.net/contact-groups/allusers-contact-group-4lqxdp) **Marker.io Issue type:** Improvement **Issue details:** [Open in Marker.io](https://app.marker.io/i/68f7ef838991532c10f5d5a1?advanced=1) â€” #MILO-16

title: special "All users" group
body:
[![Screenshot_2025-10-21_20-41-32.png](https://img.marker.io/s/68f7effc50b84a4173a61eab/2?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..c8plHteqhx-WaczZJalD-O8g3KjKexzHWEvvFO2eE8g)](https://img.marker.io/s/68f7effc50b84a4173a61eab/0?code=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..c8plHteqhx-WaczZJalD-O8g3KjKexzHWEvvFO2eE8g) I think we need to put some thought into a default "all users" group that Milo can auto-subscribe every user who registers. We need this as a private list long term for legal reasons, and it should be somewhat special and maybe not hidden in a long list. This may overlap with "Workflows" (e.g. signup any new users to the "All users" group). --- **Reported by:** Jacob Smith (jsmith@datum.net) **Source URL:** [https://staff.datum.net/contact-groups](https://staff.datum.net/contact-groups) **Marker.io Issue type:** Improvement **Issue details:** [Open in Marker.io](https://app.marker.io/i/68f7effc50b84a4173a61eaf?advanced=1) â€” #MILO-17
